WorkItem.Description:
I keep getting buggy results with the optimizer trying to find the best setup for cat dps. I've attached the character below. Also, is there anyway to adjust the survivability value for cat dps? I'd like to set it up to 0 if possible when looking at gear upgrades.
Â 
With the attached character file, my last run of the optimizer by dps rating, full thoroughness, and regem/reenchant checked, it found a gearset of 5430.369 vs the current 5454.3

Comments.Message: Can you explain whats 'buggy' about it? Just that it didn't find the best gearset, or something actually wrong with what it did come up with, or something else?
It found a set worse than what was currently equipped. I made sure everything equipped was checked for the optimizer.
That set contains a Accurate Monarch Topaz in the helm, which is not marked as available. Try marking that as available, and see if you get the expected results.
Oh sorry about that. It originally had the fierce monarch topaz in that gem slot when i got the unexpected results.  I forgot I put that gem in to see if I could cap hit and expertise.

Ok, I ran it again just to make sure. Optimizer found a gearset of 5435.575 dps rating vs my currently equipped score of 5454.3, so it's still a tad buggy for some reason with trying to find the best dps set available.
Which version of Rawr are you running? When I open this file in 2.1.6 in cat module it shows dps rating 5309.097 (in latest dev build it shows 5375.784, I'm not sure what is the difference).
Odd, I have 2.1.6 release downloaded from the link in the right side column.

I've been enabling and disabling various buffs to see what might be the discrepency. One thing I noticed was that bloodlust didn't actually do anything to either dps rating or attack speed. I'll keep trying to see why yours is only showing 5309 vs what I'm seeing as 5454
If we have the same version, and are seeing different results, the difference must be the items. Have you edited any of the items (ie, trinkets perhaps)?
Ahh yes. I edited the fury of the five flights to 320 AP as it had a value of 0 with the 2.1.6 build.
